name: ether.fi Staked EIGEN
description: eEIGEN is ether.fi's flagship product that brings liquid restaking to the EIGEN token. Created to service the growing demands of alternate collateral within restaking, eEIGEN simplifies restaking and expands DeFi utility. Users can deposit EIGEN on ether.fi to mint the eEIGEN Liquid Restaking Token (LRT). Restaking rewards are paid out in LRTÂ² which represents a share of pooled rewards collected from restaking.
